Rumored to be making Master of Space and Time with Clowes, this Frenchman also directed Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, The Science of Sleep, and Dave Chappelle's Block Party, as well as numerous music videos.

texts: Name this show about Kenny Powers, a washout Major League Baseball player who gets a second chance.
Married to Jeremy Piven's sister since 1996, this former Saturday Night Live head writer is the co-creator of Eastbound & Down. He has directed such films as Stepbrothers and Anchorman.
The role of Ashley Schaffer in Eastbound & Down is played by this frequent McKay collaborator, the star of Talladega Nights, who also portrayed Robert Goulet on SNL.
